GK19bahcar5_pu:416: kṣitir iyaṃ tava iti lakṣaṇākhyātacakravartipadasya punaruktam iva.
GK19bahcar5_pu:417: gṛhyatāṃ śrīr iti svayam eva śriyā parigṛhītasya viparītam iva.
GK19bahcar5_pu:418: adhyāsyatām ayaṃ loka ity ubhayalokavijigīṣor apuṣkalam iva.
GK19bahcar5_pu:420: ātmīkriyatāṃ rājakam iti guṇagaṇātmīkṛtajagato gatārtham iva.
GK19bahcar5_pu:424: sātatyena śastrābhyāsaḥ kārya iti dhanurguṇakiṇakalaṅkakālīkṛtaprakoṣṭhasya kim ādiśyate.
GK19bahcar5_pu:425: nigrāhyatāṃ cāpalajātam iti nūtanataravayasi nigṛhītendriyasya niravakāśeva me vāṇī.
GK19bahcar5_pu:426: niravaśeṣatāṃ śatravo neyā iti sahajasya tejasa eveyaṃ cintā.
GK19bahcar5_pu:427: ity evaṃ vadann evāpunarunmīlanāya nimimīla rājasiṃho locane pratyapadyata ca pūṣātmajaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_pu:428: asminn evāntare pūṣāpy āyuṣeva tejasā vyayujyata tataś ca lajjamāna iva narapatijīvitāpaharaṇajanitād ātmajāparādhād adhomukhaḥ samabhavat.
GK19bahcar5_pu:430: mandaṃ mandam apriyapraśnārtham iva laukikīṃ sthitim anuvartamāno 'vātarad divaḥ.
GK19bahcar5_pu:431: ditsur iva janeśāya jalāñjalim aparajalanidhisamīpam upasasarpa.

GK19bahcar5_pu:490: iva hṛdayābhighātād udvamann uṣṇaniḥśvāsamokṣair bhavanam ājagāma.

GK19bahcar5_pu:513: asvatantrīkṛtaś ca tair manasāpi nālabhata śokānupravaṇam ācaritum.

GK19bahcar5_pu:528: ete ca hasitamadālasahaladharavibhramā vilāsāḥ ko 'nyo mānī vikrānto vadānyo vā iti.
